title: 06/29/21 DPS Hour 2 Jon Rahm
itunes:title: 06/29/21 DPS Hour 2 Jon Rahm
description:
Jon Rahm tells Dan that he has his US Open trophy right out in the open at his house. Jon says that he drank orange juice out of the trophy and he did try to bathe his new born in the trophy, but he was too big.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
